attributes.action: Prevent election frauds by introducing internet based voting system.
attributes.additional_details: Voters will get a password in order to vote. In every voting satiation there will be a computer connected to the internet with printer. Voters will cast their vote on the computer using election web site; once they have done that, the computer will print copy of their vote. The printed ballot will be put in to the ballot box. We will get instant election result. The online result and the counted ballots will be compared to see if the vote count is right. The result will be free from election frauds and there will be no vote count dispute.
